title: Scrollbars should be disabled in ImageAnalyzer example
description: The scrollbars in the ImageAnalyzer example are enabled, but they do not have any effect when moved. This can be misleading, especially when opening a small image such as an icon.
OB: When opening the ImageAnalyzer example in build F2 (20020602) on Redhat 7.2, GTK2KDE 2.210 (GTK2 only), the scrollbars are enabled and can be moved, but they do not have any effect.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Launch build F2 (20020602) on Redhat 7.2, GTK2KDE 2.210 (GTK2 only).
2. Open the ImageAnalyzer example.
3. Observe that the scrollbars are enabled and can be moved, but they do not have any effect.
